pageSubTitle.myProfile: You may wish to update any of your personal details
pageSubTitle.selectlanguage: Your selected language will be applicable across the app.
pageSubTitle.addCourse: Provide details of the material to create a new Course Material. Save the changes once you are satisfied with the content
pageSubTitle.editCourse: Provide updated details of the material. Save the changes once you are satisfied with the content
pageSubTitle.myCourseMaterials: Course Materials are courses, documentation, educational materials, and other written information and any other materials. My Course Material shows the list of courses you have created
pageSubTitle.recommendedCourseMaterials: Course Materials are courses, documentation, educational materials, and other written information and any other materials. Recommended Course Material shows the list of courses based of your interest you have set in your profile. Keep the interest updated to get relevant recommendations
pageSubTitle.availabilityPlannerMentor: Plan you availability for a mentorship session by adding a day in a week when you can spend some time. We will find manatees who needs mentorship
pageSubTitle.availabilityPlannerMentee: If you need help or guidance in a specific subject, plan you availability for a mentorship session by adding a day in a week when you can spend some time. We will find Mentor(s) who can guide you in those subjects
pageSubTitle.addSchedule: Provide details of the Schedule to create a new Schedule. Save the changes once you are satisfied with the content
pageSubTitle.editSchedule: Provide updated details of the Schedule. Save the changes once you are satisfied with the content
pageSubTitle.availableMentorSession: Based on your requirement and availability, below session are found
pageSubTitle.signInInfo: Provide your email address you have used while creating the account, and we will send you a verification code in your email. Use the code to sign in
pageSubTitle.accVerification: We have send you a verification code in your registered email. Use the code to verify your account
pageSubTitle.signUp: Provide details to create your free account
pageSubTitle.addCourseMenu: Provide the content title and select the content type of the course material. Save the changes once you are satisfied with the content
pageSubTitle.editCourseMenu: Provide updated details of the title. Save the changes once you are satisfied with the content
pageSubTitle.selectImage: Select an image from your device. Save the image if you are satisfied with the preview
pageSubTitle.addQuestion: Provide details of the question and choose answer types to create a new question. Save the changes once you are satisfied with the content
pageSubTitle.editQuestion: Provide updated details of the question. Save the changes once you are satisfied with the content

formInfo.intarest: What are subjects / topics you are interested in to.
formInfo.yourCred: Your credential, you use this email to sign in
formInfo.courseName: Provide a suitable name to the course you want to create
formInfo.courseDescription: Provide a suitable description describing your course
formInfo.teacherAvailabilityContext: What is the context of your mentorship session. Your session can be on any topic. For ex, any school subject, mentorship on goal session etc
formInfo.studentAvailabilityContext: What is the area you need guidance. You can add topics like, any school subject, mentorship on goal session etc
formInfo.onlineMeetingUrl: Provide a online sessions url. You can add Zoom / Google Hangouts / Skype / Slack / Facebook Live / YouTube Live / MS Teams or any other meeting url
formInfo.accVerification: Provide the verification code you have received in your email
formInfo.articleTitle: Provide a suitable title to the course menu
formInfo.contentType: Select what type of content you want to create
formInfo.question: Provide your question
formInfo.visibilityLiveNoChange: This content is currently in live mode and visible to public. The content can not be updated
formInfo.visibilityLive: This content is currently in live mode and visible to public. To update the content, change visibility to preview
formInfo.visibilityPreview: This content is currently in preview mode and visible to private. Any changes to the content can be made
formInfo.visibilityPreviewNoChange: This content is currently in preview mode and visible to only content owner. Any changes to the content can be made. Once the content is live, it can not be changed any further
formInfo.contentDuration: Select the duration (in minute) to complete the content
formInfo.contentReward: Select the reward after successfully completing the content
formInfo.articleDuration: Total duration to complete the content
formInfo.articleReward: Total reward to earn after successfully completing the content

noData.noCourseMaterialData: You have not yet created any Course Materiels, add a new one !!
noData.noRecommendedCourseMaterialData: We have not found any course material based on interest. Keep the interest updated to get relevant recommendations !!
noData.noAvailabilityPlannerData: No schedules found, plan a new schedule !!
noData.noTopic: No Topic has been found. Create your first topic !!
noData.noContent: No Content has been found. Add your Content !!
noData.noQuestion: No question has been found. Add your question !!
noData.availableSoonContent: The content will be available soon !!

loading.holdTight: Hold tight, we are looking for your data
loading.newCourseMaterial: Adding New Course Material ... Please wait
loading.newCourseMaterialMenu: Adding New Course Material Menu ... Please wait
loading.editCourseMaterialMenu: Updating Course Material Menu ... Please wait
loading.deleteCourseMaterialMenu: Deleting Course Material Menu ... Please wait

errorMessage.imageSize: Image file size beyond 1 MB not allowed

actionAlert.delete: Are you sure you want to Delete
actionAlert.deleteMenu: All sub menus will be deleted, are you sure you want to Delete
actionAlert.changeVisibilityGeneral: Are you sure you want to Change the visibility of the content
actionAlert.changeVisibilityAssignment: Are you sure you want to change the visibility of the content, you will not be able to edit the content once its Live
actionAlert.answerSubmit: Are you sure you want to submit the answer

response.newCourseMaterial: Your Course Material has been saved, you can update any time!!
response.editCourseMaterial: Your Course Material has been updated successfully!!
response.deleteCourseMaterial: Your Course Material has been deleted successfully!!
response.feedbackSubmitted: Thank you for taking time to share your feedback!!
response.teacherNewAvailabilityPlanner: Your Schedule has been saved, you can update any time!!. We will look for any Mentee who would like to join your session
response.studentNewAvailabilityPlanner: Your Schedule has been saved, you can update any time!!. We will look for any Mentor who would like help you in you mentorship needs
response.editAvailabilityPlanner: Your Schedule has been updated successfully!!
response.deleteAvailabilityPlanner: Your Schedule has been deleted successfully!!
response.newCourseMaterialMenu: Your Course Material Menu has been saved. Its time to add content to it!!
response.editCourseMaterialMenu: Your Course Material Menu has been updated successfully!!
response.deleteCourseMaterialMenu: Your Course Material Menu has been deleted successfully!!
response.newQuestion: Question has been saved, you can update any time until live!!

categoryModal.info: Provide category details which can help to attach the category while adding a new skill
